marklogic.body: I understand the anguish and one tragedy does not rule out another, however it is Trayvon Martin the 17 year old gunned down by an armed neighborhood watchman that is the subject of this story. Trayvon was not a criminal, was not involved in any criminal activity yet George Zimmerman shot him in Cold blood even after Mr Zimmerman was told to back by police dispatch. But even this is not the cause of the outrage, the fact that nothing had been done by the Sanford Police Department to investigate the death of the teenager and had simply taken the word of the shooter that he in self-defense even though witnesses have come forward and have claimed that it was not in self-defense, this is what makes this case so outrages. An innocent black child gunned down by a white man and the white police force will not investigate. There is simply no reason for the police to take the hands Off stance.
